name: make_deposit
attributes: # [doc = " 保証金（デポジット）を預託するが、"]
# [doc = " deposit_account.owner と ctx.accounts.depositor.key() の一致検証がない"]
body: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . deposit_account ;
acct . deposit_amount = acct . deposit_amount . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;
acct . deposit_count = acct . deposit_count . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . depositor . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . deposit_pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += amount ;

fields.name: deposit_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] などで所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: deposit_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " デポジットを溜めておくプールアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: depositor
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 保証金を預けるユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このデポジット口座を所有するべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: deposit_count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " デポジットを行った回数"]
